name: Bouncy Balance
description:
Bouncy balance is officially here. Battle friends and family for high score in the never ending game of balancing paddles,keeping your self away from any thing that is in black color.

Simply touch the right side for jump character and left side for go forward or backward character.
Increase your point by touching the paddle.
The person who touches the most number of paddles wins.
Use points for purchasing new characters and powers.


Features :

* Insanely simple and addictive
* Endless Gameplay that never gets old
* Slow down time for 10 seconds!
* Beautiful new characters
* New die animation for different characters
* Refreshing music
* Pleasant graphics
